summary: THE ALUMINUM WHEELS ON THE 2001 MITSUBISHI ECLIPSE SPYDER DENT ALMOST EVERYTIME A MINOR POTHOLE OR RAILROAD TRACKS ARE RIDDEN OVER.  I HAVE HAD TO REMOLD THE RIMS 5 TIMES SINCE PURCHASING THE CAR LESS THAN TWO YEARS AGO.  THESE RIMS SHOULD BE RECALLED FROM MITSUBISHI.  FROM ALL THE REMOLDING OF THE RIMS, NOW I HAVE TIRE PRESSURE PROBLEMS.  THIS IS A SERIOUS PROBLEM THAT NEEDS TO BE ADDRESSED.   *NLM
